hasDitaContent.@value: Zidovudine increases the risk of haematological toxicity when given with dexibuprofen. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Zidovudine   increases   the risk of haematological toxicity when given with   dexibuprofen .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both dexibuprofen and zoledronic acid can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  dexibuprofen  and  zoledronic acid  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.
